text: Hi..I am fully aware that the main functionality of the chat widget is to have it pop-up on your website or HubSpot pages, I'd actually like to make a page where the chat is embedded as part of the actual page body. How we can achieve this?

<@U020CTDRH4Z> You can use the inlineEmbedSelector and style the widget to fit your needs:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/conversation/chat-widget-sdk>
I need to Associate a ticket with contact. What i need to add in the ObjectType, ObectjID and associationType field?
Sharing for visibility - I feel like this is kind of a big issue.
`|tojson`  filter also seems to get hungup when being used on RTE content - specifically with inlined styles any thoughts on workarounds?
Can anyone tell me if there is a way to view a list and see everything related to it: contacts assigned, pages/assets associated for private access, etc?
